name: 陳怡倩
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1	Course Introduction
Week 2	Activity I
Week 3   Activity I cont.
Week 4	Course reader 1
Week 5   Course reader 2
Week 6	Course reader 3
Week 7	Course reader 4
Week 8	Course reader 5
Week 9	Course reader 6
Week 10	 Activity II
Week 11	 Activity II cont.
Week 12	 Course reader 7
Week 13	 Course reader 8
Week 14	 Course reader 9
Week 15	 Course reader 10
Week 16	 Course reader 11
Week 17	 TBA
Week 18	 Final exam
scorePolicy: Attendance & Active Participation (15%); Class Activities (20%); Weekly Quizzes (35%); Final Exam (30%).
